73.question: Which of the following situations has a conventional cash flow so that an internal rate of return can be safely calculated and used?
choices: Your company undertakes a mining project in which the land must be reclaimed at the end of the project
You invest in a safe dividend stock and receive dividends each year.
You lease a car and pay by the month

73.correct_answer: You invest in a safe dividend stock and receive dividends each year.
